messages.text: Hi, I'm looking for a 2BHK in Dubai
Great! Any specific area in mind?
Preferably Marina or JVC
What's your budget?
Max 120k. Can we do a site visit this week?
Hi, I reached out last week about the 3BHK listing in Business Bay.
Yes, I remember. We had discussed some options.
Just checking if there’s any update or if a viewing can be scheduled soon?
Hi, I saw your ad for a used MacBook Pro. Is it still available?
Yes, it's still available. It's the 2021 model, 16-inch, M1 Pro chip.
Great. How much are you asking for it?
I'm asking $1400 for it.
Would you be willing to accept $1250?
Hi, I need someone to check the AC in my apartment. It's not cooling properly.
Sorry to hear that. Could you share your apartment number and preferred time for a technician visit?
Sure, Apartment 304, and anytime after 4 PM today works.
Got it. We’ve scheduled a technician for 4:30 PM today.
Hi, I’m interested in the iPhone 15 Pro Max you have on your website.
Happy to help! Are you looking for any specific storage size or color?
512GB, Natural Titanium.
We have that in stock. Do you want it unlocked or tied to a specific carrier?
Hi, I wanted to check if I can get an appointment with Dr. Patel this week.
Sure, Dr. Patel is available on Wednesday and Thursday afternoons. Which day works better for you?
Thursday afternoon would be ideal.
Got it. I've booked you for Thursday at 2 PM. You'll receive a confirmation shortly.
Hello, I think I was overcharged for my recent electricity bill.
I can check that for you. Can you share your account number?
Thanks. I see an unusual spike last month. We'll initiate a review and update you within 24 hours.
Hi, I’m looking for an L-shaped sofa in dark gray.
We have a few models in stock. What dimensions are you looking for?
Around 8x6 feet, suitable for a medium-sized living room.
Got it. I’ll send you a few matching options with prices shortly.
